concept.definition: Oral Health: examinations, diagnositics, cleaning and basic restorative services.
Oral Health: major treatment and restorative services.
Oral Health: orthodontic services, eg. braces.

description: This value set includes sample Contract Term SubType codes.
name: Contract Term Type Codes

text.div:
Contract Term Type Codes

This value set includes sample Contract Term SubType codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/contracttermsubtypecodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
oralhealth-basic OralHealth-BasicOral Health: examinations, diagnositics, cleaning and basic restorative services.
oralhealth-major OralHealth-MajorOral Health: major treatment and restorative services.
oralhealth-orthodontic OralHealth-OrthodonticOral Health: orthodontic services, eg. braces.
